title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 407.2 - Services program year
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 407.2 - Services program year

State Regulations
(a) The plan becomes effective on the date so designated by the commissioner once
the plan is approved by the commissioner, and remains in effect until such time
as the commissioner approves a plan for the next three-year period. (b) Any plan submitted to the department must
be modified by the approved annual implementation report. Amendments to the
plan may be made in accordance with section
407.10
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
407.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
